name: Forest Walk (tinkkles)
description:
A simple little walking sim about collecting mushrooms at night. Web build is pretty slow so there's a .exe download below :)

Controls:

  • Hold (spacebar) to put out lantern
  • Press (E) to pick up mushrooms
  • Press (R) to fix resolution if you resize the window

Credits:

Player sprite: 

Animated Pixel Adventurer by rvros 

Models: 

3D Nature pack (extended) by Kenney Vleugels (Kenney, www.kenney.nl)

Music: 

Fresh Air by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3776-fresh-air
